```{r, include=FALSE}
library(slidify)
library(slidifyLibraries)
# slidify('index.Rmd')
# https://ozanj.github.io/heoc20grads/

library(servr)
# Start server: servr::httd()
# Check if server(s) running: daemon_list()
# Stop server(s): daemon_stop(which = daemon_list())

library(stringr)

create_img <- function(img='https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1511717004695-7862a87f4b3d?w=200') {
  if (str_detect(img, '^http')) {
    src <- img
  } else {
    src <- file.path('.', 'assets', 'photos', img)
  }
  return(paste0('<div class="img-wrapper"><img src="', src, '"></div>'))
}

create_quote <- function(txt='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.') {
  return(paste0('<div class="quote"><i class="fa fa-quote-left" aria-hidden="true"></i>', txt, '<i class="fa fa-quote-right" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>'))
}
```
